projects.name: Risk-Aware Resource Allocation for Robust Wireless Autonomy
projects.summary: Risk-Aware stochastic optimization for resource allocation in power-constrained multi-terminal point-to-point communication networks with fading. The generalizing solution extends the classical waterfilling algorithm. Convergence analysis of the problem for nonconvex channel rate functions is included.

projects.name: Design of Index Modulation-Based Molecular Communication Systems
projects.summary: Comprehensive analysis on molecular multiple-receiver systems, with respect to communication performance and channel characteristics. Additionally, an elaborate channel modeling is provided for molecular multiple-receiver systems with fully-absorbing spherical receivers.

projects.name: Hand Gesture Recognition via AI
projects.summary: Hand gesture recognition from live camera stream, via several machine learning methods such as logistic regression, neural nets, decision tree and random forest. Recognised hand gestures are fed into unsupervised rock, paper, scissors game.
